Description: Sherd from Ionian or Aeolian pottery plate, white slip on inside, broad bands surrounding central star(?) pattern; added red lines; exterior: black band in middle, dilute band nearer lip.
Curator's comments: Object owned and held by Leiden University, Faculty of Archaeology. This record is included in the British Museum database as part of the Museum’s Naukratis Project, a research collaboration that aims to virtually re-unite finds from the ancient port city of Naukratis, now distributed over 80 museums worldwide.
Bibliographic references: Prins de Jong 1925 / Scherben aus Naukratis: Aus der Sammlung des Universitäts-Professors Dr Fr W Freih von Bissing (p. 39-40, no. C 1b)
Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GK.62)
Additional IDs: Miscellaneous number: I.C 1b (cat. no. in Prins de Jong 1925)
